name: Assorted Questions from Classic Oldies Quiz | Television | 10 Questions

questions.text: Peter Graves was not the original actor to play the 'control' in 'Mission Impossible'. The actor that he replaced was whom?
questions.explanation:
Steven Hill.

	Hill was Mr. Briggs; he was replaced by Graves as Mr. Phelps.

questions.text: Both Linda Evans and Lee Majors got their start as TV series stars in the same show, "The Big Valley". It was what genre?
questions.explanation:
Western.

	'The Big Valley' with Barbara Stanwyck, Peter Breck and Richard Long lasted four seasons. Linda Evans went on to become well known as Krystal Carrington on the hit drama "Dynasty" and Lee Majors had success in the same time period on the series "The Fall Guy".

questions.text: This actress who starred in "The Bob Newhart Show", was at one time married to Troy Donahue.
questions.explanation:
Suzanne Pleshette.

	She was on that series from 1972-78, but beforehand was in the 1963 thriller "The Birds". She had many roles in film and TV before her death in 2008, at age 70.

questions.text: This show featured a former Miss America.
questions.explanation:
Barnaby Jones.

	Lee Meriwether was Miss America in 1955. She played Betty Jones on "Barnaby Jones" in starting in 1973 and ending in 1980. Afterward, she played Ruth Martin on "All My Children" for awhile.

questions.text: This actress had a role in a TV series in which we heard her voice and saw her legs - and nothing more.
questions.explanation:
Mary Tyler Moore.

	MTM was David Janssen's secretary in 'Call Mr. D' (also known as 'Richard Diamond, Private Eye'). Mary was on in season three, and her name was Sam.

questions.text: This Walt Disney TV show scored a huge success with Davy Crockett. Who played Davy?
questions.explanation:
Fess Parker.

	Ebsen played his friend, Georgie.

questions.text: Before he became a huge TV star, Regis Philbin was the sidekick to this TV personality on his talk show.
questions.explanation:
Joey Bishop.

	Carson blew Joey away. Regis went on to spend 1988-2011 on the morning talk show "Live".

questions.text: Before 'The Brady Bunch', Robert Reed was in another successful TV series. This show was about what profession?
questions.explanation:
Lawyers.

	E.G. Marshall starred in 'The Defenders'.

questions.text: Following the success of 'The Twilight Zone', many other sci fi shows hit the air. One such show, 'Thriller' was hosted by this man.

Finally, here is some recognition for possibly the worst TV show of all time: 'My Mother, the Car'. A man's mother is reincarnated as his automobile - it's as bad as it sounds. The star of this show was who?
questions.explanation:
Jerry Van Dyke.

	Ann Sothern played Gladys Crabtree, the voice of the car. The car was a 1928 Porter. The series last for only one season, but had a large episode count for that season at 30.
